About Me:

I'm a senior at UC Santa Cruz, majoring in Computer Science with a specialization in 3D graphics.
Additionally, I enjoy working on creative coding projects, particularly enhancing experiences using Three.js.

  • Currently working on ThreeJS Journey by Bruno Simon.
  • Research assistant for Samir Ghosh in the SET (Social Emotional Technology) Lab integrating Three.js with vr projects.
  • Webmaster for UCSC AI Club.
  • learning about WebGL and WebGPU.

Feel free to reach out on Instagram or email for collaborations.
